author: namngrg
content: Hey all, I am working on making the tree structure and tests for trees in nim for Nimbus, by taking references from https://github.com/gballet/go-verkle/blob/master/tree_test.go and https://github.com/gballet/go-verkle/blob/master/tree.go. Can someone suggest some resources to better understand these or any suggestions about how to go about writing tests from the start?

author: jsign
content:
